description:
Update indicator for using pkcon to get information on updates.

* Check for updates from an indicator

* It shows also the following package status (if using a Debian-based distro):
  - Available updates
  - New packages in repository
  - Local/Obsolete packages
  - Residual config files
  - Autoremovable packages

* Forked from https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1010/archlinux-updates-indicator/
name: Update Indicator
